2020.07.29, blog/conejo.

redecorating, etc.

Some Second Life updates …

Last night Tantan (shawty! 💕) helped me redecorate the conejoBeat venue a bit. It’ll be a while before the next rave, so in the meantime it functions as Nezubo’s house.

Watermelon Fest 🍉🌾🏖

The weekend before last, the Committee hosted the Conejo Watermelon Festival—a two-part event, Tanamala’s harvest party on the 18th and Rein’s pool party on the 19th.
